TopicTitle: help finding mod: mod that saves craft when decoupled

Articles.Content: does anybody know of the name of the mod that made it so when you decoupled part of your craft with a probe core attached, it would save said vehicle and freeze it in time and not let it despawn so you can have spaceX or vigin galactic type crafts, so you can use a plane to launch a rocket, decouple the plane, and the plane will freeze in time, and the rocket will keep burning toward orbit, and then when your in orbit, switch to the frozen launch vehicle, and pilot it back down. i remember seeing it for a second on the addon development or releases page, thank you if you manage to find it!
FMRS is the abbreviated name. That's a starting point at least

FMRS is the abbreviated name. That's a starting point at least

Only vaguely heard of this but found it in less than a minute: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80292-0-24-2-Flight-Manager-for-Reusable-Stages-%28FMRS-v0-2-00%29
yes! thats the mod! thank you guys very much!
